translation.ko: 안 돼, 싸울 수 없어 당신이 예견한 거잖아

translation.en: What you wanted.
This is not what I wanted, Ayo.
Are you sure this is not what you wanted?
No.
[Ayo] Dera, look at me.
Are you sure this is not what you wanted?
Because all I can think about right now is spending the rest of my life with you.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면, 지금 온통 드는 생각은 당신이랑 여생을 보내는 거니까

translation.en: Merry Men!
Merry Men!
[Pidgin] Finally, he falls head over heels!
Thank you so much for agreeing to help.
And who would have thought that you guys had a single romantic bone in your body?
translation.ko: 당신들 몸에 로맨스 뼈가 하나 있는 걸 누가 알았겠어요?

translation.en: Well,
I guess that's what happens when you meet the perfect somebody.
translation.ko: 완벽한 누군가를 만나면 그런 일이 일어나죠
